Friends (Blogroll)

Great blogs from my local area:

  • Ivan Blagojević
  • Kompjuteraš
  • LINog
  • Ljuska
  • Miloš Miladinović
  • PenTester.iz.rs
  • Vorasov blog
  • Željko Popivoda

The list of free culture communities in my region:

  • LiBRE! – Monthly regional free software magazine
  • BalCCon – Regional hacking congress
  • Piratska Partija – Bosnian Pirate Party
  • Piratska Stranka – Croatian Pirate Party
  • Piratski Pokret – Serbian Pirate Party (currently offline)
  • Linux za sve – Croatian free software forum
  • HULK – Croatian Linux users association
  • HrOpen – Croatian free software / free Internet association
  • Free and OpenSource Serbia – Serbian free software forum
  • Mozilla.ba – Bosnian Mozilla community
  • Mozilla.rs – Serbian Mozilla community
  • Mozilla.me – Montenegro Mozilla community
  • Ubuntu Srbija – Serbian Ubuntu community
  • LibreOffice Srbija – Serbian LibreOffice community
  • LUGoNS – Linux User Group of Novi Sad
